title: AquaFusionNet: Lightweight VisionSensor Fusion Framework for Real-Time Pathogen Detection and Water Quality Anomaly Prediction on Edge Devices
summary: Evidence from many low and middle income regions shows that microbial contamination in small scale drinking water systems often fluctuates rapidly, yet existing monitoring tools capture only fragments of this behaviour.
